extensionDescription.message: Afficher les onglets dans une arborescence.

command_tabMoveUp.message: Déplace l'onglet courant vers le haut

command_treeMoveUp.message: Déplace l'arborescence courante vers le haut

command_tabMoveDown.message: Déplace l'onglet courant vers le bas

command_treeMoveDown.message: Déplace l'arborescence courante vers le bas

command_focusPreviousSilently.message: Focus sur l'onglet précédent (ne déplie pas l'arborescence)

command_focusNextSilently.message: Focus sur l'onglet suivant (ne déplie pas l'arborescence)

command_focusFirstChild.message: Focus sur le premier onglet enfant

command_focusLastChild.message: Focus sur le dernier onglet enfant

command_focusPreviousSibling.message: Focus sur l'onglet de même niveau précédent

command_focusNextSibling.message: Focus sur l'onglet de même niveau suivant

command_increaseSubPanel.message: Increase Size of the Sub Panel

command_decreaseSubPanel.message: Decrease Size of the Sub Panel

command_groupSelectedTabs.message: Créer un nouveau group depuis les onglets sélectionnés

tabDragHandle_tree_tearoff_tooltip.message: Start dragging to detach this tree from the window

tabDragHandle_tree_bookmark_tooltip.message: Start dragging to bookmark this tree

tabDragHandle_tab_tearoff_tooltip.message: Start dragging to detach this individual tab from the window

tabDragHandle_tab_bookmark_tooltip.message: Start dragging to bookmark this individual tab

groupTab_temporaryAggressive_label.message: Close this tab when there is one or less child

groupTab_options_label.message: Il y a une option pour désactiver l'ouverture de ce type d'onglet.

bookmarkTree_notification_success_messag.message: $COUNT$ tabs including "$TITLE$" are bookmarked under a new folder "$PARENT$.

bookmarkTabs_notification_success_messag.message: $COUNT$ tabs including "$TITLE$" are bookmarked under a new folder "$PARENT$".

bookmark_notification_notPermitted_messa.message: Echec d'obtention de permissions pour créer des marques-page. Cliquez ici pour obtenir des permissions supplémentaires.

tabDragBehaviorNotification_message_base.message: Glisser en dehors du panneau va $RESULT$.

tabDragBehaviorNotification_message_inve.message: Glisser sans la touche Shift va $RESULT$.

tabDragBehaviorNotification_message_tree.message: détacher les onglets de la fenêtre
créer des liens ou des marques-page à l'endroit où les onglets sont déposés

tabDragBehaviorNotification_message_tab_.message: créer un lien ou un marque-page à l'endroit où l'onglet est déposé

warnOnCloseTabs_message.message: You are about to close $NUMBER$ tabs. Are you sure you want to continue?

warnOnCloseTabs_warnAgain.message: Warn me when I attempt to close multiple tabs

warnOnAutoGroupNewTabs_message.message: $NUMBER$ tabs are opened in a time. Do you want them to be grouped in a tree?

warnOnAutoGroupNewTabs_warnAgain.message: Demandez-moi quand plusieurs onglets sont ouvert en même temps

message_startup_description_1.message: Tree Style Tab's vertical tab bar is available as one of choosable sidebar panels. If you don't see it yet, hit the

message_startup_description_3.message: button in the toolbar, to activate the sidebar panel.

message_startup_requestPermissions_descr.message: ⚠Il y a quelques fonctionnalités qui requierent des permissions supplémentaires. Si vous voulez les utiliser, acceptez les permissions manuellement.

message_startup_requestPermissions_bookm.message: "Marquer cette arborescence" dans le menu contextuel sur les onglets (requiert l'accès aux marque-page)

message_startup_requestPermissions_allUr.message: Don't expand collapsed tree and skip collapsed descendants, while switching focus of tabs via keyboard shortcuts (requires script injection to webpages for detection of keyboard operations)

message_startup_userChromeCss_notify.message: How to hide top tab bar and sidebar header?

message_startup_userChromeCss_descriptio.message: Due to restrictions of WebExtensions, Tree Style Tab cannot control Firefox's top tab bar and the sidebar header. If you need to control them, see

note that it is very low level customization, thus there is no guarantee and it can cause troubles on future versions of Firefox. Please try it at your own risk, only when you know what you are doing and if you are confident that you can resolve such troubles by yourself.

api_requestedPermissions_message.message:
⚠The addon "$NAME$" is requesting to do following operation:

$PERMISSIONS$

via Tree Style Tab's API. Click here if you grant that.

context_groupTabs_label.message: Créer un nouveau group depuis les onglets

context_collapsed_label.message: Plié (for testing of a checkbox type menu)

context_pinnedTab_label.message: Épinglé (for testing of a radio type menu)

context_unpinnedTab_label.message: Désépinglé (for testing of a radio type menu)

config_sidebarPosition_description.message: *This configuration won't change the position of the sidebar itself. You need to click the switcher in the sidebar header and click "Move Sidebar to Right" manually.

config_style_none_info.message: (*Please decorate everything by yourself via "Extra style rules for sidebar contents")

config_applyBrowserTheme_label.message: Appliquer le thème du navigateur (*disponible pour Plain, Vertigo et Mixed)

config_faviconizePinnedTabs_label.message: Afficher les onglets épinglés uniquement par leur icône

config_maxFaviconizedPinnedTabsInOneRow_.message: or less tabs for each row (*0 or less means auto-calculation)

config_showCollapsedDescendantsByTooltip.message: Show collapsed descendants in the tooltip on a tab

config_applyThemeColorToIcon_label.message: Apply theme color to the toolbar button

config_emulateDefaultContextMenu_label.message: Simulate Tab Context Menu on the sidebar

config_longPressOnNewTabButton_before.message: Long-press on the "New Tab" button to

config_longPressOnNewTabButton_newTabAct.message: specify where the new tab is opened in

config_showNewTabActionSelector_label.message: Show selector button on the "New Tab" button, to specify where the new tab is opened in, when the button is pointed

config_showContextualIdentitiesSelector_.message: Show container selector button on the "New Tab" button, when the button is pointed

config_newTabAction_caption.message: Behavior for new tab actions (other toolbar buttons, keyboard shortcuts, and others)

config_autoAttachOnNewTabCommand_child.message: a child of the current tab

config_autoAttachOnNewTabCommand_sibling.message: a sibling of the current tab

config_autoAttachOnNewTabCommand_nextSib.message: the next sibling of the current tab

config_guessNewOrphanTabAsOpenedByNewTab.message: Guess a newly opened tab as opened by "New Tab" action, when it is opened with the URL

config_autoAttachOnNewTabButtonMiddleCli.message: For middle click, open new blank tab as
a child of the current tab
a sibling of the current tab
the next sibling of the current tab

config_autoAttachOnDuplicated_before.message: Clic du milieu sur le bouton "Actualiser", duplique l'onglet comme

config_autoAttachOnDuplicated_sibling.message: a sibling of the current tab

config_autoAttachOnDuplicated_nextSiblin.message: the next sibling of the current tab

config_sameSiteOrphan_caption.message: When new tab with a website same to the current tab is opened from the location bar (or others)

config_autoAttachSameSiteOrphan_child.message: a child of the current tab

config_autoAttachSameSiteOrphan_sibling.message: a sibling of the current tab

config_autoAttachSameSiteOrphan_nextSibl.message: the next sibling of the current tab

config_inheritContextualIdentityToSameSi.message: Inherit the container of the current tab

config_insertNewChildAt_caption.message: Insertion position of new child tabs

config_insertNewChildAt_noControl.message: No control (respect the decision by Firefox or other tab addons)

config_insertNewChildAt_first.message: Insert to the top of the tree, as the first child

config_insertNewChildAt_end.message: Append to the end of the tree

config_insertNewTabFromPinnedTabAt_capti.message: Insertion position of new tabs from pinned tabs

config_insertNewTabFromPinnedTabAt_noCon.message: No control (respect the decision by Firefox or other tab addons)

config_insertNewTabFromPinnedTabAt_first.message: Insert to the top of the tree, as the first child

config_insertNewTabFromPinnedTabAt_end.message: Append to the end of the tree

config_autoGroupNewTabsDelayOnNewWindow_.message: But don't group new tabs opened within
msec when a new window is opened, as a part of tabs opened as "home page".

config_autoGroupNewTabsFromPinned_label.message: Auto-group tabs opened from same pinned tab

config_inheritContextualIdentityToNewChi.message: Inherit the container of the parent tab to a new blank tab (*Please note that the new tab won't inherit the container of the previously active tab, if it is opened as an independent tab)

config_successorTabControlLevel_caption.message: Quand le dernier enfant de l'arborescence est fermé

config_successorTabControlLevel_inTree.message: Focus sur le précédent onglet de l'arborescence

config_successorTabControlLevel_simulate.message: Focus sur l'onglet suivant (comportement Firefox par défaut)

config_successorTabControlLevel_never.message: Ne pas controler le focus (respecte le comportement de Firefox ou celui d'une autre extension)

config_successorTabControlLevel_legacyDe.message: *Firefox's built-in behavior for "browser.tabs.selectOwnerOnClose"="true" works prior to this config.

config_simulateSelectOwnerOnClose_label.message: Move focus back to the opener tab if possible, when the current tab is closed (*simulation of Firefox's built-in behavior for "browser.tabs.selectOwnerOnClose"="true", prior to the config above)

config_parentTabBehaviorForChanges_capti.message: When a parent tab is moved or closed by someone from outside of the tree sidebar

config_parentTabBehaviorForChanges_alway.message: Treat as a parent always (move or close all descendant tabs also together), whether the tree sidebar is visible or not.
Treat as a parent always, when the tree sidebar is visible. / Treat just as a solo tab, when the tree sidebar is invisible.

config_parentTabBehaviorForChanges_onlyI.message: Treat as a parent by operations inside the tree sidebar. / Treat just as a solo tab, by operations outside the tree sidebar.

config_fixupTreeOnTabVisibilityChanged_c.message: Quand la visiblité des onglets est changée par d'autres extensions

config_fixupTreeOnTabVisibilityChanged_f.message: Fix up tree structure with visible tabs automatically (*Recommended if you use another addon to switch tab groups)

config_fixupTreeOnTabVisibilityChanged_k.message: Keep tree structure including hidden tabs (*Recommended if you use another addon which changes temporary visibility of tabs)

config_autoCollapseExpandSubtreeOnAttach.message: Quand une nouvelle arborescence est créee, plier les autres automatiquement

config_autoCollapseExpandSubtreeOnSelect.message: Quand un onglet a le focus, déplie l'arborescence et plie les autres automatiquement
Except focus moving caused by closing of the current tab

config_collapseExpandSubtreeByDblClick_l.message: Double cliquer sur l'onglet pour plier/déplier l'arborescence

config_closeParentBehavior_caption.message: Quand l'onglet parent est fermé lorsque l'arborescence est dépliée

config_closeParentBehavior_replaceWithGr.message: Remplacer l'onglet parent par un onglet vide pour conserver l'arborescence

config_closeParentBehavior_promoteFirst.message: Le premier onglet enfant est le nouveau parent

config_closeParentBehavior_promoteAll.message: Tous les onglets enfants sont au même niveau que l'onglet parent

config_promoteFirstChildForClosedRoot_la.message: Le premier onglet enfant est le nouveau parent, si l'onglet parent n'a pas de parent

config_closeParentBehavior_detach.message: Libère les onglets enfants de l'arborescence

config_warnOnCloseTabs_label.message: Warn me when I attempt to close multiple tabs

config_tabDragBehavior_caption.message: Quand une arborescence est glissée en dehors de la barre d'onglet

config_tabDragBehavior_description.message: Due to Firefox's restrictions, you need to decide it when you start dragging: how tabs are treated on dropped outside of TST's sidebar. Shift key pressed on starting of dragging or the "drag handle" a small draggable tooltip appearing near the left (or right) edge of each tab are available to switch the action.

config_tabDragBehavior_tearoff_tree.message: Détacher l'arborescence de la fenêtre (impossible de créeer de marque-page)

config_tabDragBehavior_bookmark_tree.message: Create links or bookmarks from Whole Tree (but impossible to detach from the window)

config_tabDragBehavior_tearoff_tab.message: Detach Individual Tab from the window (but impossible to create bookmark)

config_tabDragBehavior_bookmark_tab.message: Create link or bookmark from Individual Tab (but impossible to detach from the window)

config_showTabDragHandle_label.message: Show drag handle on a edge of each tab, to start dragging for specific purpose

config_showTabDragBehaviorNotification_l.message: Afficher une notification sur ce qu'il arrivera aux onglets déplacés en dehors du panneau, pendant le déplacement.

config_dropLinksOnTabBehavior_caption.message: When a link or URL string is dropped on a tab

config_bookmarkTreeFolderName_before.message: Nom du dossier pour "Marquer cette arborescence":

config_bookmarkTreeFolderName_descriptio.message: Available placeholders: %TITLE% (title of the first tab), %URL% (URL of the first tab), %YEAR% (year, four digits), %MONTH% (month, two digits), %DATE% (date, two digits)

config_simulateCloseTabByDblclick_label.message: Fermer l'onglet par double clic (*simulation du comportement par défaut de Firefox pour "browser.tabs.closeTabByDblclick"="true")

config_supportTabsMultiselect_label.message: Utiliser l'API de multi-sélection d'onglets pour controler le focus d'onglet (*dépend du paramètre "browser.tabs.multiselect"="true" de Firefox lui-même)

config_userStyleRules_label.message: Règles d'apparence supplémentaires pour les contenus du panneau

config_userStyleRules_themeRules_descrip.message: Following custom properties are also available via "var()", based on the current browser theme:

config_addons_description_after.message: . Check them out if you need more features on TST's sidebar.

config_externaladdonpermissions_label.message: Permissions for API Call from Other Addons

config_externaladdonpermissions_descript.message: Addons allowed here may access detailed tab data or tabs in private windows, through Tree Style Tab's permissions, even if the addon ifself is forbidden by Firefox to access them. Please don't give permission for addons if you cannot trust them.

config_simulateSVGContextFill_label.message: Activate workaround for the Bug 1388193 and Bug 1421329 to simulate SVG icons (*This may increase CPU usage. To deactivate this option, you need to activate "svg.context-properties.content.enabled" via "about:config", until these bugs are fixed.)

config_useCachedTree_description.message: *Please try unchecking and re-checking this to refresh the cache, when the behavior around tree is unstable.

config_storeCacheAsWindowValue_label.message: Store cache to each window instead of tabs (this will reduce bloating of the session data, but may introduce unstable tree restoration)

config_acceleratedTabCreation_label.message: Accelerate operations around newly opened tabs (*NOTE: You'll see unstable behavior around tabs.)

config_maximumAcceptableDelayForTabDupli.message: Abort tab duplication when it takes

config_requestPermissions_bookmarks.message: Permettre de lire et de créer des marques-page

config_requestPermissions_allUrls.message: Don't expand collapsed tree and skip collapsed descendants, while switching focus of tabs via keyboard shortcuts. (*You need to allow executing scripts on webpages.)

config_requestPermissions_tabHide.message: Allow to show/hide individual tabs (*You must uncheck and re-check this before running tests, to ensure the permission is truly granted.)

config_requestPermissions_fallbackToTool.message: Click the "Tree Style Tab" toolbar button
Due to Firefox's bug, you cannot request permission from this screen. Please click the "Tree Style Tab" toolbar button to grant permissions.
